title: "World Values Survey (WVS)"

## Overview

The 7th Wave of the World Values Survey, cleaned and merged with World Bank GDP data. The WVS is a global research project exploring people's values and beliefs across different countries and cultures.

**Used in:** Week 2 (Data Documentation), Week 3 (Report Writing)

## Data Files

| File | Description |
|------|-------------|
| `WVS_random_subset2000.csv` | Random subset of 2,000 respondents stratified by country |
| `WVS_GDP_merged_data.csv` | Country-level aggregated data merged with GDP and population indicators |
| `WVS_subset.csv` | Selected variables from full dataset |
| `codebook.pdf` | Official WVS codebook with variable definitions |
| `README_WVS.md` | Data processing documentation |

[Browse data files](data/)

## Code

| File | Description |
|------|-------------|
| `cleaning.R` | R script that processes raw WVS data and creates cleaned datasets |

[Browse code files](code/)

## Key Features

- International survey data covering 50+ countries
- Economic indicators merged from World Bank
- Multiple aggregation levels (individual and country-level)
- Detailed codebook documentation

## Sample Research Questions

- Relationship between income level and trust/happiness
- Cultural differences in gender attitudes
- Economic development and social values
